to	O

and	O

,	O

over	O

perform	O
his	O
obligations	O
under	O
this	O
lease.	O
19.1.	O
the	O
lessor	O
specifically	O
agrees	O
and	O
undertakes	O
that	O
in	O
the	O
event	O
the	O
demised	O
premises	O
are	O
hereinafter	O
transferred	O
,	O
mortgaged	O
or	O
conveyed	O
to	O
any	O
third	O
party	O
by	O
the	O
lessor	O
,	O
such	O
transfer	O
shall	O
be	O
subject	O
to	O
the	O
terms	O
of	O
this	O
lease	O
and	O
the	O
lessor	O
shall	O
ensure	O
that	O
the	O
transferee	O
of	O
the	O
demised	O
premises	O
shall	O
be	O
bound	O
by	O
the	O
terms	O
of	O
this	O
lease.	O

in	O

of	O

any	O
